item.description:
Enjoy a fun, easy to moderate level hike through the beautiful trails of Hopkinton State Park.

Hike will last between 1 and 2 hours.

Be sure to bring water with you.

Dogs are allowed on a leash and poop needs to be scooped.

Directions: After entering the park, follow signs to boat house, drive past boat house, and park towards the end of the lot by the water and entrance to beach area.

 

If it rains or snows, hike is cancelled. If it is cancelled, it will state so on the site the morning of the event so be sure to check the site if there is a question.
item.name: Fun Hike at Hopkinton State Park
